item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven and the nearby area.

This week's location is: Kasbah Garden Cafe 105 Howe Street. Tel: 203.777.5053

 

PLEASE RSVP

If you are a "Maybe", please RSVP as "YES" and indicate MAYBE in the comments.

Your contact is SELAM; number will be in RSVP.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a Friend**

 

****IMPORTANT NOTES*****

 - Please note this is a BYOB!! Happy Hour!! Kasbah does not sell alcohol, so please bring your own.

- They sell all other beverages: coffee, soda, Moroccan teas, etc.which are reasonably priced.

- They serve great Moroccan food/apps/desserts. I encourage you to support them by getting a platter or two to share with your friends.

- They have Hookah pipes!! I believe they are about $10 dollars.

***FYI--Hookah pipes are fun and LEGAL (it's fruit or tobacco you're smoking). They can be shared by a group of 4-5 all night.

- They may have LIVE Music + belly dancing.

 

***Don't forget: You are supporting local business which in turn is enriching your life with goodness that comes from culture: food, music, company, etc!

 

See you then!!
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually the Largest group at the bar on a Monday. If that does not work, feel free to call the contact/host listed in the description.
item.name: Happy Hour at Kasbah Garden Cafe!
